questionTitle: The student's hard work was ...................... with success in his degree examinations.
The new experimental system didn't ...................... expectations.
The pass ...................... was fifty-five per cent of the candidates.
The words "attic, skylight and porch " all have something to do with ......................
If a person is conceited, he or she is .................................
This video film is so interesting that I ............. it twice.
This is the first time I............. the experiment on plant breeding.
"............ is it from your house to the museum?" "Ten kilometers"
There may be as ............. as six guests to dinner.
"Pantipa has been awarded a scholarship to study in France." "Oh, really? ...................... !"
My young brother grew very quickly and soon he was ........... my mother.
Everyone in the town realized what ........ man he was.
last novel was unfinished when he died .
